pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MOSS emspy## DescriptionThis is the Python SDK to interact with [M.O.S.S. Computer Grafik Systeme GmbH](https://www.moss.de/wega/) WEGA-EMS## InstallationThis package kann be installed using pip```shellpython -m pip install moss_emspy```## Usage```pythonmy_service = Service("http://localhost:8080/wega-ems/", username="Test", password="Test")my_service.projects```
